attributes.action: Raise more awareness and channel more funds into the research of Ovarian cancer and health
attributes.additional_details:
Raise more awareness of Ovarian cancer and ovarian health through campaigns, seminars and fundraising events.

Abolish the stigma and embarrassment surrounding women's health and provide a more 'open' policy in talking about women's health and wellbeing.

Also research and more awareness needs to be made about Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome which increases the risk of developing ovarian cancer as well as type 2 diabetes, obesity and heart disease as well as infertility.
